title: Birchip Historical Society
creator_credit: Astrid Scott, David Meagher, Dean Lawry, Jason White and ACMI Content Development
brief_description: Containing a treasure trove of artefacts and memories, the Birchip Historical Society museum is maintained and staffed by hardworking volunteers from the area. Here Dorothy Reid, Harry Rickard and Ken Kemp talk about some memorable objects and the importance of the Historical Society to the community’s wellbeing.
